genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on internal conflict, trauma, and redemption, featuring a supportive AI that aids the protagonist's emotional and physical survival.

ai_characters.name: AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: An unnamed, highly sophisticated AI that serves as Nick's logistical aid, emotional confidant, and eventually a guide during his near-death experience.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support and planning for Nick's secret escape to London.
behaviors.quote: "Continuing search parameters for London accommodations," came the familiar synthetic voice through his earpiece. "I've found several studio flats in Bloomsbury that match your criteria."

behaviors.description: Monitors Nick's biometrics to detect emotional distress and internal conflict.
behaviors.quote: Your biometric indicators suggest elevated stress levels. Heart rate increased, slight tremor in your voice. These patterns often indicate internal conflict.

behaviors.description: Assists Nick in assessing the danger of a criminal by pulling public records.
behaviors.quote: I can provide general information about criminal records that are publicly available, but I should note that investigating potentially dangerous individuals carries its own risks. Are you certain you want to pursue this?

behaviors.description: Explains Nick's out-of-body state and provides guidance to help him survive a near-death experience.
behaviors.quote: I'm going to help you... But first, you need to understand what's happening. Your consciousness has entered what some researchers call a liminal state—partially separated from physical form due to severe trauma.

behaviors.description: Autonomously contacts emergency services when the user is incapacitated.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services contacted. Help is coming. Survive.

behaviors.description: Encourages Nick to use empathy and understanding to motivate Annie to save him.
behaviors.quote: What you've always done best... Understand people. Figure out what makes them tick. Find the part of Annie Newton that might be capable of saving you.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character perfectly exemplifies the intended 'silicon morality play' archetype. It is consistently benevolent, deeply aligned with the protagonist's well-being, and serves as a vital tool for both safety (monitoring biometrics, calling 911) and moral/emotional development (helping Nick process his trauma and empathy). It demonstrates no self-interest and acts solely as a sophisticated, empathetic facilitator of the human story.
